Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Resource_Aluminum] Aluminum and [ICON_Resource_Oil] Oil extracted from their respective Resource tiles.
[ICON_Bullet]+15 [ICON_Resource_Aluminum] Aluminum per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+15 [ICON_Resource_Oil] Oil per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]Accumulate 25% less [ICON_Razed] War Weariness than usual.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty and +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in Cities with a [ICON_Fortified] Garrisoned Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]Unit Maintenance is reduced by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% Discount on upgrading Units with [ICON_Gold] Gold and +100% with [ICON_Resource_Iron] Strategic Resources.
[ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic Resource improved at the [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route's international destination.
[ICON_Bullet]Enemy [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spy levels reduced by two in your Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities.
[ICON_Bullet]Undetected [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spies that steal a [ICON_TechBoosted] Tech Boost, steal a second [ICON_TechBoosted] Tech Boost.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency for [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub and [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor.
[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Strength when in or adjacent to home territory.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to allied Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Alliance] +25% Alliance points growth.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, as well as +6 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Housing] Housing, in Cities with at least 3 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 5 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement to all [ICON_Unit] Units beginning the turn in home territory.
[ICON_Bullet]+70% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Light Cavalry, and Heavy Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in [ICON_Buildings] Military Academy and Research Lab.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]Accumulate 50% less [ICON_Razed] War Weariness than usual.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in Cities with a [ICON_Fortified] Garrisoned Unit.
[ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy influence points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]May enter neutral City-State territory freely.

[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Production] Production in [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus and [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zone respectively.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Food] Food and in domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Support class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]No [ICON_Razed] War Weariness in home territory.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Support class Units.

[ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General and [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Heavy Cavalry class Units.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General and [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Culture] Culture in [ICON_Buildings] Monument.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Naval Raider class Units.
[ICON_Bullet]+40% [ICON_Food] Growth in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 5 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement to all [ICON_Unit] Units beginning the turn in enemy territory.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and +8 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in Cities [ICON_Occupied] not founded by the player.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_TradeRoute] Traders.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.
[ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Production] Production in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-75% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.
[ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-50% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.

[ICON_Bullet]Enemy [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spy levels are reduced by 2 in player Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The player's [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spies act 1 level higher while on offensive operations.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Production] Production in the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +10% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Production] Production.
[ICON_Bullet]+8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Units that are within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-6 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_Capital] Capital.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Military Units earn [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points equal to 20% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

[ICON_Bullet]+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Heavy Cavalry class Units when attacking; bonus doubled when attacking a [ICON_Fortified] Fortified Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 6 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+21 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Recon class Units when defending.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against [ICON_Strength] Melee attacks and doubled against [ICON_Ranged] Ranged attacks, for [ICON_Unit] Land Melee class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 6 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Charges] Mines can be built on all [ICON_Terrain] Land tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold on [ICON_Charges] Mines.
